name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_1
description: Cross the frontier between the civilized and barbarian worlds and conquer both. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Macedon on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_2
description: Spread the rule of Thrakian tribes to all eastern Mediterranean. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Odrysian Kingdom on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_3
description: Lead your people out of the edge of civilization and reach for your destiny. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Molossian Kingdom on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_4
description: Use the riches of your lands and grow into a leading world power. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Thessalian League on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_5
description: Transform the small merchant state into a booming powerful empire. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Chalkidike on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_6
description: Make the western coast of Greece a stronghold from which you will rule the rest of the Greek lands. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Korkyra on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_7
description: Bring your province out of the Persian shadow and take the rule in Eastern Mediterranean yourself. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Caria on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_8
description: Dominate the western coast and build an empire that spans the whole Greece. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Akarnania on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_9
description: From poverty and hardship build a dominating Greek power. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Aetolia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_10
description: Leave the secure island and build a lasting empire on the Greek mainland. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Euboea on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_11
description: Shake off the shadow of Boeotia and Athens and grow to dominate the whole of Greece. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Phokis on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_12
description: Earn the place in history that you deserve. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Boeotia on a campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_13
description: End the servitude to the Persian overlords and become the leader of a united Anatole yourself. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Mysia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_15
description: Use your position that spans the whole Eastern Mediterranean and become the only ruling power in Greece. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Athens on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_16
description: From a small overlooked state to a prosperous empire, follow the path to greatness. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Achaia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_17
description: Revive the days of past glory and challenge the dominating powers in a fight for supremacy. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Argolis on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_18
description: Employ diplomacy, force and trade to build a position of power and prestige. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Elis on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_19
description: Lead your people from the heart of the Arkadian mountains to the golden throne of Greece. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Arkadia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_20
description: Poor and ridiculed, show the world that Messenians are stronger than them all. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Messenia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_21
description: Let no one doubt that Sparta is the dominant Greek power forever. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Sparta on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_22
description: Use your island bases to spread your influence and power and tie the Persian and the Greek worlds together under your auspices. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Rhodes on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_23
description: Shake off the Persian yoke and dominate the whole of eastern Mediterranean. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Lydia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_24
description: Tie your provinces firmly to your side and lead the last victorious campaign to crush the Greeks forever. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Achaemenid Empire on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_25
description: Take the lead and rise to the seat of supreme power that you deserve. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Phrygia on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_26
description: Use the strategic positions of your towns and colonies and tie opponents to your side. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Korinth on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_27
description: Challenge the “civilized” Hellenes and force them to their knees. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Dardanian Kingdom on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_28
description: From humble beginnings, grow and expand your realm. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Encheleans on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_29
description: Don’t let the enemies crush the spirit of victory. Win a game by completing any victory condition as Thessaly Pherae on the campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_25
description: Don’t rely on one unit type only. Recruit at least 1 unit from 3 different army groups.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_2
description: Employ elite troops trained into highly skilled and deadly units. Train 1 military unit with at least 7 improvements.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_3
description: Never rest in building beautiful, splendid cities that show the greatness of your empire. Build at least 1 city of size 8.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_4
description: Growing populations need more food and dependence on trade to feed your people is risky. Increase food yields to 30 surplus food/turn.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_5
description: Let the populace of your country grow. Reach 1K Citizens.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_6
description: Bring prosperity and well-being to your people. Reach 150% Happiness.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_7
description: One discovery leads to another, with even greater innovation. Never stop learning! Completely research of all the technologies in the Research Tree.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_8
description: Let your power be felt. Annex at least 1 opponent state.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_9
description: Conquest can hardly be done without enemy losses. Kill at least 15 enemy ground military units in battle.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_10
description: Become the master of the seas. Win at least 10 naval battles by sinking the enemy vessels.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_11
description: Push the opponents to their limits. Conquer at least 1 capital city of another nation.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_12
description: Leave the choice to the enemy city – starvation or surrender. Lay successful siege to at least 3 enemy cities.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_13
description: The weak shall be ruled by the strong. Conquer at least 1 civilization.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_14
description: Send your men into a battle, those who survive will only get stronger. Reach 100% Experience with at least 1 unit.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_15
description: Have your troops facing an enemy and knowing they have total superiority. Reach “Excellent” army morale with at least 1 opponent.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_16
description: Persuade foreign cities that the grass is greener on your side of the fence. Successfully convert 5 cities to your nation by using influence.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_17
description: Let your troops do a bit of foraging and raiding along the enemy trade routes on sea or land. Steal some traded goods from your opponent through raids.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_18
description: Whip up the morale of your soldiers, they must feel invincible. At least 1 unit has a 150% General Morale.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_19
description: Create a spark and then reap the fruits of rebellion. Convert 3 cities to your nation using a General.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_20
description: Building an empire on a number of scattered islands is no easy feat. Can you win by completing any victory condition on a Large Islands or Archipelago map in the customized world?

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_21
description: Fight with all you have to survive in the worst of conditions. Can you win by completing any victory condition on a map with Harsh or Barren climate setting in the customized world?

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_22
description: Can you sail through hardships of life without looking back? Win a game on a Medium or higher difficulty in an Ironman mode.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_1
description: Use force or soft power to make others your vassals. Make at least 3 opponents members of your federation or confederation on the campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_2
description: Get to grips with the game mechanics and become a master. Go through the game tutorial.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_3
description: Take one step a time on the path that leads to greatness. Complete all Objectives for any nation on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_4
description: Send your athletes to compete with the best and win the Olympic wreath. Take part and win the Olympic games in a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_5
description: Sail out to Colchis to collect and return the legendary Golden Fleece. Successfully complete the Golden Fleece quest on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_6
description: Find the sandals of the gods’ messenger Hermes and bring it to his sanctuary as an offering. Successfully complete the Talaria quest on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_7
description: Be the first to retrieve the cap of invisibility and return it to its rightful owner – the god Hades in the Underworld. Successfully complete the Helm of Hades quest on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_8
description: Find the precious belt of queen Hippolyte and return it to the Amazons. Successfully complete the Girdle of Hippolyte quest on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_9
description: Great wealth has been lost over the decades and centuries. Successfully complete at least 1 of the treasure quests on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_10
description: Creatures of the old myths can help as well as harm. Visit and gain favor of all 5 mythical creatures on land and sea (Centaur Chiron, Naiads, Nereids, Kirke, Sorcerer) on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_11
description: Lead the quarreling city-states of Peloponnese into unity under your wings. As one of the states on Peloponnese (Achaia, Argolis, Arkadia, Elis, Messenia, Korinth) conquer the whole peninsula.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_12
description: Humble your opponents by building the giant structure of Kolossos on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_13
description: Use the knowledge of Sages and lift the fog that blinds you. Build a Seer on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_14
description: Don’t shy away from the battle of your life. Win a game by completing any victory condition on a campaign map on Heroic level.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_15
description: It is the vision of Macedonian kings that they will rule over the whole of Greece. As Macedon seize all Greek lands north of Peloponnese.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_16
description: Let no one surpass you! Win a game by completing all 5 victory conditions on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_17
description: Build an army that cannot be beaten. Win a game by completing the Military Superiority victory condition on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_18
description: Win by completing Victory Points on campaign map

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_19
description: Build, develop and improve. Life in abundance and luxury is a good life. Win a game by completing the Country Development victory condition on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_20
description: Lead the progress and scientific advancements. Win a game by completing the Technological Dominance victory condition on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_21
description: Leave no one capable of claiming victory. Win a game by completing the Overall victory condition on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_22
description: Shake off the yoke of Achaemenid overlords and seize the whole of Anatole for yourself. As one of the satrapies (Caria, Lydia, Mysia, Phrygia) conquer the whole region of Anatole.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_23
description: Win game on Medium or higher difficulty in Ironman mode as Aetolia on a campaign map.

name: CAMPAIGN_ACHIEVEMENT_24
displayName: Ironman mode - win as Odrysian Kingdom
description: Win game on Medium or higher difficulty in Ironman mode as Odrysian Kingdom on a campaign map.

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_24
description: Once discovered, the world will become your oyster. Can you win by completing any victory condition on a Small or Tiny map in the customized world?

name: CUSTOM_ACHIEVEMENT_23
description: Don’t neglect the defenses of your cities, nor their cultural and social life. Improve 1 city with at least 4 improvements (Thrifty City, Amphitheater, Academy, Civil Service, City Walls).

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_1
description: Troy will never bow to the avaricious Greeks. Defend the great city with all the power you have. Win as Troy by completing the Protect Troy victory condition.

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_2
description: Use the cunning for which you are known and win the war by finding the Fairest Helen rather than by bloodshed. Win as Ithaka by completing the Fairest Helen victory condition.

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_3
description: Storm the gates of Troia and crush the Trojans once and for all. The great city must be yours! Win as Mykenai by completing the City of Troia victory condition.

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_4
description: The deaths of your enemies will bring you immortality. Win as Myrmidons by completing the Glory Points victory condition.

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_5
description: Write your name in the Book of Fate in the blood of your enemies. Win as Salamis by completing the Glory Points victory condition.

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_6
description: Pay respect to the Sea God Poseidon by building a great statue to him. Be the first to build a Trojan Horse.

name: TROY_ACHIEVEMENT_7
description: The walls of Troia are reputedly impregnable. Prove the Trojans wrong and be first to break through the walls.
